parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: Name of the sheet to set up

parameters.name: PaperSize
parameters.description: Size of paper as defined in swDwgPaperSizes_e ; valid only if TemplateIn is set to swDwgTemplates_e.swDwgTemplateNone

parameters.name: TemplateIn
parameters.description: Template as defined in swDwgTemplates_e

parameters.name: Scale1
parameters.description: Scale numerator

parameters.name: Scale2
parameters.description: Scale denominator

parameters.name: FirstAngle
parameters.description: True for first angle projection, false for third angle projection

parameters.name: TemplateName
parameters.description: Name of custom template with full directory path; valid only if TemplateIn is set to swDwgTemplates_e.swDwgTemplateCustom

parameters.name: Width
parameters.description: Paper width; valid only if TemplateIn is set to swDwgTemplates_e.swDwgTemplateNone or PaperSize is set to swDwgPaperSizes_e.swDwgPapersUserDefined

parameters.name: Height
parameters.description: Paper height; valid only if TemplateIn is set to swDwgTemplates_e.swDwgTemplateNone or PaperSize is set to swDwgPaperSizes_e.swDwgPapersUserDefined

parameters.name: PropertyViewName
parameters.description: Name of view containing the model from which to get custom property values

parameters.name: RemoveModifiedNotes
parameters.description: True to delete modified notes, false to not

parameters.name: ZoneLeftMargin
parameters.description: Zone area left margin; distance from drawing sheet's left edge

parameters.name: ZoneRightMargin
parameters.description: Zone area right margin; distance from drawing sheet's right edge

parameters.name: ZoneTopMargin
parameters.description: Zone area top margin; distance from drawing sheet's top edge

parameters.name: ZoneBottomMargin
parameters.description: Zone area bottom margin; distance from drawing sheet's bottom edge

parameters.name: ZoneRow
parameters.description: Number of zone rows in the zone area of this sheet (see Remarks )

parameters.name: ZoneCol
parameters.description: Number of zone columns in the zone area of this sheet (see Remarks )

title: IDrawingDoc.SetupSheet6
description: Sets up the specified drawing sheet.
signature:
System.Boolean SetupSheet6( 
   System.String
Name
,
   System.Int32
PaperSize
,
   System.Int32
TemplateIn
,
   System.Double
Scale1
,
   System.Double
Scale2
,
   System.Boolean
FirstAngle
,
   System.String
TemplateName
,
   System.Double
Width
,
   System.Double
Height
,
   System.String
PropertyViewName
,
   System.Boolean
RemoveModifiedNotes
,
   System.Double
ZoneLeftMargin

ZoneRightMargin
,
   System.Double
ZoneTopMargin
,
   System.Double
ZoneBottomMargin
,
   System.Int32
ZoneRow
,
   System.Int32
ZoneCol
)

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: Name of the sheet to set up

parameters.name: PaperSize
parameters.description: Size of paper as defined in swDwgPaperSizes_e ; valid only if TemplateIn is set to swDwgTemplates_e.swDwgTemplateNone

parameters.name: TemplateIn
parameters.description: Template as defined in swDwgTemplates_e

parameters.name: Scale1
parameters.description: Scale numerator

parameters.name: Scale2
parameters.description: Scale denominator

parameters.name: FirstAngle
parameters.description: True for first angle projection, false for third angle projection

parameters.name: TemplateName
parameters.description: Name of custom template with full directory path; valid only if TemplateIn is set to swDwgTemplates_e.swDwgTemplateCustom

parameters.name: Width
parameters.description: Paper width; valid only if TemplateIn is set to swDwgTemplates_e.swDwgTemplateNone or PaperSize is set to swDwgPaperSizes_e.swDwgPapersUserDefined

parameters.name: Height
parameters.description: Paper height; valid only if TemplateIn is set to swDwgTemplates_e.swDwgTemplateNone or PaperSize is set to swDwgPaperSizes_e.swDwgPapersUserDefined

parameters.name: PropertyViewName
parameters.description: Name of view containing the model from which to get custom property values

parameters.name: RemoveModifiedNotes
parameters.description: True to delete modified notes, false to not

parameters.name: ZoneLeftMargin
parameters.description: Zone area left margin; distance from drawing sheet's left edge

parameters.name: ZoneRightMargin
parameters.description: Zone area right margin; distance from drawing sheet's right edge

parameters.name: ZoneTopMargin
parameters.description: Zone area top margin; distance from drawing sheet's top edge

parameters.name: ZoneBottomMargin
parameters.description: Zone area bottom margin; distance from drawing sheet's bottom edge

parameters.name: ZoneRow
parameters.description: Number of zone rows in the zone area of this sheet (see Remarks )

parameters.name: ZoneCol
parameters.description: Number of zone columns in the zone area of this sheet (see Remarks )

returns: True if drawing sheet setup is successful, false if not
remarks:
After calling this method, call
IModelDoc2::ForceRebuild3
to update any changes to first angle/third angle projections in the drawing views.
If you specify a different filename for TemplateName than what is currently being used by SOLIDWORKS, then SOLIDWORKS updates the sheet format.
The drawing sheet can be set up with zones that annotations in other views can reference. Each zone is referenced by an alphanumeric label that is defined using the Zone Editor. See the SOLIDWORKS Help for more information about drawing sheet zones.
Multiplying ZoneRow by ZoneCol equals the total number of zones in the zone area of this drawing sheet. The zone area is specified by ZoneLeftMargin, ZoneRightMargin, ZoneTopMargin, and ZoneBottomMargin.
To modify the setups of multiple drawing sheets with just one call to IDrawingDoc::SetupSheet6, call
IDrawingDoc::SetSelectedSheets
before calling IDrawingDoc::SetupSheet6.
